mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file(file_name, file_new_name, file_type, file_url, create_date, update_date, deleted) values (#{fileName}, #{fileNewName}, #{fileType}, #{fileUrl}, now() ,now(), #{deleted});
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_file SET b_id = #{bId},u_id=#{uId},update_user=#{updateUser} WHERE id = #{id}
